scripts.vercel-build: npm run generate-abis-if-possible && npm run generate-verification-json-if-possible && npm -w @fixdescriptorkit/ts-sdk run build && npm -w apps/web run build
scripts.generate-abis: cd contracts && forge build && cd .. && node scripts/generate-abis.js
scripts.generate-abis-if-possible: npm run generate-abis || echo '⚠️ Foundry not available, using committed ABI files'
scripts.generate-verification-json-if-possible: npm run generate-verification-json || echo '⚠️ Foundry not available, using committed verification JSON'
